game.miscDetails: The trackball moves the player. There are two 4-way joysticks, one one each side of the trackball, but they are both wired to the same input. Mame maps both sticks to the left stick of a dual stick combo to avoid the conflicting default keyboard mapping of the normal joystick and the trackball; mame's right stick input type is not used. (Note for HowardC: Accepted for now, but I'll try to get the mame devs to accept a fixed one. Remapping to avoid conflict is silly as almost everyone maps the 'left joystick' to match their regular joystick. Now if it was mapped to joystick right then I could have seen it.) Keep an eye on this game for driver changes.
